property.name: content
property.label: Content
property.description: Quote content in Markdown format, leave empty to get a slot in LWR.
property.default: "Berios sim destrum facientota nis ex eost aut prae vendis explam aliquis dolorpo rrorem reptaep elenis net."

property.name: authorName
property.label: Author name
property.default: Her Excellency the Hon. Linda Dessau AC

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
